org.apache.hadoop.hbase

接口 ServerMetrics

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ServerLoad

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public interface ServerMetrics
    This class is used for exporting current state of load on a RegionServer.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Set<String> getCoprocessorNames()
      Return the RegionServer-level and Region-level coprocessors
      int getInfoServerPort() 
      long getLastReportTimestamp() 
      Size getMaxHeapSize() 
      Map<byte[],RegionMetrics> getRegionMetrics() 
      ReplicationLoadSink getReplicationLoadSink()
      Call directly from client such as hbase shell
      List<ReplicationLoadSource> getReplicationLoadSourceList()
      Call directly from client such as hbase shell
      long getReportTimestamp() 
      long getRequestCount() 
      long getRequestCountPerSecond() 
      ServerName getServerName() 
      Size getUsedHeapSize() 
      default String getVersion() 
      default int getVersionNumber() 

    • 方法详细资料

      • getServerName

        ServerName getServerName()

      • getVersionNumber

        default int getVersionNumber()
        返回:
        the version number of a regionserver.

      • getVersion

        default String getVersion()
        返回:
        the string type version of a regionserver.

      • getRequestCountPerSecond

        long getRequestCountPerSecond()
        返回:
        the number of requests per second.

      • getRequestCount

        long getRequestCount()
        返回:
        total Number of requests from the start of the region server.

      • getUsedHeapSize

        Size getUsedHeapSize()
        返回:
        the amount of used heap

      • getMaxHeapSize

        Size getMaxHeapSize()
        返回:
        the maximum allowable size of the heap

        int getInfoServerPort()

      • getReplicationLoadSourceList

        Call directly from client such as hbase shell
        返回:

ReplicationLoadSink getReplicationLoadSink()
        Call directly from client such as hbase shell
        返回:
        ReplicationLoadSink

      • getRegionMetrics

        返回:
        region load metrics

      • getCoprocessorNames

        Set<String> getCoprocessorNames()
        Return the RegionServer-level and Region-level coprocessors
        返回:
        string set of loaded RegionServer-level and Region-level coprocessors

      • getReportTimestamp

        long getReportTimestamp()
        返回:
        the timestamp (server side) of generating this metrics

      • getLastReportTimestamp

        long getLastReportTimestamp()
        返回:
        the last timestamp (server side) of generating this metrics
